Rsagacmd 0.0.9
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Generates list of options for a saga-gis tool

create_tool.Rd

Parses the html table for a saga-gis tool into a list of identifiers, options, defaults and constraints

create_tool(tool_information, tool_options)

Arguments

tool_information

list
tool_options

list

Value

named list, containing three items: + `tool_name` syntactically-correct name for the tool + `tool_cmd` command to use for saga_cmd to execute tool + `options` named list of the tool's parameters containing: - `type` data type of parameter - `name` long name of the parameter - `alias` syntactically correct alias for the SAGA's identifier - `identifier` identifier used by saga_cmd - `description` tool description - `constraints` description of the parameters constraints - `default` default parameter value - `minimum` minimum permissible value - `maximum` maximum permissible value - `feature` type of feature, e.g. Shapes, Shapes List, Grid etc. - `io` whether the parameter represents an input or output

Contents
